Texto: 
normal
surgery followed by radiation therapy
• enhancing mass arising from left tentorial leaflet.
• prominent flow voids centrally and peripherally.
• homogeneous enhancement.
• no definite "dural tail."
anaplastic meningioma, who 3
• meningioma
• lymphoma
• hemangiopericytoma
15 year old boy who presents to er with headache.
an outside ct had revealed a high density mass arising from left tentorial leaflet.  it is unusual to find a meningioma in a patient this young. the pathologic examination revealed 4 to5 mitotic figures per high power field indicative of an aggressive atypical meningioma who grade ii/iii
